thread.title: How to Make the S'mores Dip Everyone on Pinterest Is Talking About
thread.title_full: How to Make the S'mores Dip Everyone on Pinterest Is Talking About

author: Anna Monette Roberts
title: How to Make the S'mores Dip Everyone on Pinterest Is Talking About
text:
Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 How to Make the S'mores Dip Everyone on Pinterest Is Talking About 
There's no reason to miss out on s'mores just because you're not near a campfire. Behold this recipe for s'mores dip. Simply broil marshmallows atop melted chocolate and mallow creme, and scoop the whole gooey thing up with honey graham cracker sticks. Who needs a campfire?
